1 Welcome to the Anomaly Detection Series!

This series will guide you through the wild and wonderful world of anomaly detection, with a focus on intuition, practical examples, and a healthy dose of humor. Whether you’re a data scientist, a machine learning enthusiast, or just someone who likes finding the oddballs in a crowd, you’re in the right place.

1.1 Posts in this Series

  • Finding the Oddballs: A Not-So-Technical Guide to Anomaly Detection(Density Estimation and Robustness)

Stay tuned for more posts, including hands-on tutorials and advanced techniques!

# Welcome to the Anomaly Detection Series!

This series will guide you through the wild and wonderful world of anomaly detection, with a focus on intuition, practical examples, and a healthy dose of humor. Whether you're a data scientist, a machine learning enthusiast, or just someone who likes finding the oddballs in a crowd, you're in the right place.

## Posts in this Series

- [Finding the Oddballs: A Not-So-Technical Guide to Anomaly Detection(Density Estimation and Robustness)](finding-the-oddballs.qmd)

Stay tuned for more posts, including hands-on tutorials and advanced techniques!
